name: powder coating, aluminium sheet | powder coat, aluminium sheet | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/7117/documentation

The powder inventoried is mainly used in exterior architectural applications. The coating thickness is 80 um. The heat consumption is calculated for a sheet of 2 mm thickness.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]

The activity starts with the reception of the components at the facility.

Chromatising of the aluminium sheet, powder coating and heat curing. No transports of the aluminium sheet to the coating plant or back are inventoried.
category: C:Manufacturing/25:Manufacture of fabricated metal products, except machinery and equipment/259:Manufacture of other fabricated metal products; metalworking service activit/2592:Treatment and coating of metals; machining

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Chomatising, coating and heat curing. Treatment of the waste water is assumed.

exchanges.description:
Calculated based on literature, (Vionnet, S., Quantis Water Database - Technical Report, 2012). Thickness of the coating layer is 2microm. The process starts when untreated surface (aluminium sheet) enters the coating plant. It includes the processes: pre-treatment (cleaning) and coating itself.
